resources.string: Enter in your letter grades (A, B, C, D, or E) for each of the specified quarters and exams. Case does not matter.

\tThis app is designed to work with grades in the Howard County Public School System (HCPSS). If your school/district uses a different grading system, the grade calculated in this application may not be accurate.

The quality point ranges for grades in the HCPSS are:
A = 3.5 – 4.00
B = 2.5 – 3.49
C = 1.5 – 2.49
D = .75 – 1.49
E = Below .75
